item.title: The Beginning
item.description: This is the first chapter of The Shepherd King, written as part of NaNoWriMo. There is a tall mountain above it, and a glacier. But there are countless mountains in Anaria. Almost everything is in a mountain, or on a mountain, or in the shadows of mountains. It is in a valley, but nearly all the dwelling places of men in that land lie in valleys of some kind or another.

item.title: Adam's Peak Sunrise
item.description: During the pilgrimage season, which runs from December to March, hundreds of devout Sri Lankans nightly climb Sri Pada, or Adamâ€™s Peak. The goal is to catch the mesmerizing sunrise from the summit. At the top of the peculiar conical mountain, towering above the surrounding terrain, lies a sacred rock said to hold the footprint of the Lord Buddha, or Adam, or St. Thomas, or Shiva, or a handful of other obscure candidates, according to the religious affiliation of the storyteller.
